_header: Whoso can read may tell by mouth
_description: A story of an unhappy boy — one introductory rhyme royal stanza and 18 lines in quatrains

TCD432.First Lines:
Who so can rede may telle be mowtheHere is a story þat offt is
                    previd…
TCD432.Last Lines:
…Here þe knaue haþe no dredeWhan þe preste vp
                    þe ofte doþe liffte
TCD432.Attributed Title: A story of an onhappy boye (f. 64v)
TCD432.Editions:
Brotanek,  Rudolph. 
             Mittelenglische Dichtungen aus der Handschrift 432 des Trinity College
                in Dublin.
         Halle: Niemeyer, 1940: 93.
